Answer:

>      // greater-than

Another Example

Here is another program fragment: 

int count  = 10;
int inc    = -1;
while ( count  < 100 )   // check the relational operator
{
  System.out.println( "count is:" + count );
  count = ;
}
System.out.println( "count was " + count + " when it failed the test");

How should the assignment statement be completed so that the loop terminates? Include the variable inc in your answer. Type your answer into the blank. (This is just a place to hold your answer. Nothing else will happen.)
